info.name: Ghana SHS LMS REST API
info.description:
Ghana Senior High School Learning Management System REST API Collection

IMPORTANT SETUP STEPS:
1. Import database_lms_api.sql to create the database schema
2. Run setup.sql to create sample data (Accra SHS)
3. Use the 'Setup & Configuration' folder to retrieve IDs
4. Update collection variables with the retrieved IDs
5. Login to get access token (saved automatically)

DEFAULT CREDENTIALS (from setup.sql):
- Super Admin: superadmin / password
- Admin: admin / password
- Teacher: kofi.mensah / password
- Teacher: ama.asante / password
- Student: kwame.osei / password
- Student: abena.adjei / password

item.name: Setup & Configuration
item.description: Queries to retrieve IDs after running setup.sql. Use these to update collection variables.
